name: ColorQuest
description:
Hey here is my game for TriJam#126

Pick up all the pyramids rainbow-colored by resolving the maze ! Use arrow keys to move. Good luck !

Disclaimer : This game could not be playable by people with vision problem  (ie color blind)

Made in 7h

Development and arts are my job

Sounds assets by : 

https://freesound.org/people/mad-monkey/

https://freesound.org/people/JarredGibb/

https://freesound.org/people/steaq

https://freesound.org/people/Fupicat
